Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4213922,"totalDownVotes":354160,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":123298,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":857042,"totalDownVotes":61359,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":93435,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":684345,"totalDownVotes":50401,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[SUMMERFEST] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":52744,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2237666,"totalDownVotes":304351,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🏰High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":51535,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌊 Summer Wave 1: Welcome to Summer World, Diamond Beach! (LIVE)✅
🌊Surprise Monstercat Event! (LIVE)✅
🌊 Wave 2: Quests ☐
🌊 Wave 3: Fair Pier ☐

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":200075,"totalDownVotes":62236,"universeId":2619619496,"name":"BedWars 🌲 [ELDERTREE KIT!]","placeId":6872265039,"playerCount":46602,"imageToken":"T_6872265039_aa21","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to the BedWars beta release!

We will be updating the game daily during Beta. Report any issues on twitter and the community server!

Controls:
[Shift]: Sprint
[E]: Open inventory
[Q]: Drop item
[Ctrl]: Lock camera

How to play BedWars:
📡 Join the "BedWars" queue in the Lobby to find a match
🛌 Protect your bed. Once it's gone, you can no longer respawn!
💎 Gather resources to purchase items and team upgrades
🏹 Destroy enemy beds and eliminate players to win the match!

If you've played SkyWars before, you'll pickup BedWars in no time!","genre":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":3138617,"totalDownVotes":407664,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":31521,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons!

The summer update is now out! Summer update changelog: 
https://devforum.roblox.com/t/arsenal-summer-3/1334462
","genre":""},{"creatorId":123247,"creatorName":"alexnewtron","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2351361,"totalDownVotes":323770,"universeId":140239261,"name":"💙 MeepCity 💙","placeId":370731277,"playerCount":74936,"imageToken":"T_370731277_ebb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💙💙 The game that is Powering Imagination! 🥁 Music by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish","genre":""},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1122630,"totalDownVotes":57757,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"5X EVENT✨ Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":21769,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

Modeler: @Mirror_RBX","genre":""},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":669016,"totalDownVotes":48244,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":24913,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"In this world, no one can survive alone. Team up with friends to fend off countless waves of zombies, fight bosses, earn coins, level up, and buy new towers! Google "TDS Wiki" for in-depth game info!","genre":""},{"creatorId":6639766,"creatorName":"Century Makers","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":267023,"totalDownVotes":27216,"universeId":2549475383,"name":"[Update14] 👑Livetopia","placeId":6737970321,"playerCount":72489,"imageToken":"T_6737970321_b832","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"____💡 What's New? 💡____
👑 Your Royal Highness! 2 castles and a variety of new items including carriages, swords and shields, bows, wands, and many others!
🗺️ Map upgrade - See others on the map and start navigating!
🍳 Most houses now have a functioning kitchen. Enjoy cooking!
🔨 Additional performance, sound, and interaction optimizations.
📝 More details in the patch notes: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/1237968

_____🎈 Welcome! 🎈_____

🏡 Own different houses and cars! Boating and flying!
🐱 Play with unique pets! Aren't they cute??

_____🔥 Lovetopia 🔥_____
Thumbs-up 👍 and Favorite ⭐ if you enjoy the game and Follow 🔊 us to get timely updates!

👍 280k likes to unlock Dump Truck!!
👍 300k likes to unlock Sea Princess Outfit!!!","genre":""},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4533041,"totalDownVotes":614088,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak [x2 XP]","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":23590,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Season 4 is coming to an end! Enjoy double the XP for your contracts in this final weekend! 

🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over five billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 


THE JULY 2021 UPDATE has arrived!
🚀 ALL NEW VOLT! Free upgrade! 
💥 Destruction! Trees, stoplights and more!
🚨 SENTINEL POLICE TRANSPORTER! At the Military Base!
👮‍♀️ POLICE HQ! With gun shop and garage!
👋 PLAYER MARKERS! and more!
As always, thanks for all the love!!

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089","genre":""},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2455140,"totalDownVotes":742479,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":58995,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?

For support go to support.yx.zone","genre":""},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1608516,"totalDownVotes":131694,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":32702,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

--- 300% more health!

--- 300% more health!
--- 25% more gold!","genre":""},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Thai Piece","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":385925,"totalDownVotes":35527,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[Update] King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":31182,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

- Fruits spawn in the map every 30 Minutes - 1 Hours / Despawn 15 Minutes.
- First Time you join game you have 0.1% to get free Conqueror Ability

Cr Clothing : Blotnik","genre":""},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":241467,"totalDownVotes":12354,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[2X LOGIA🤝UPDATE 3.5] Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":10305,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure experience. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":374733,"totalDownVotes":191459,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":20339,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.
